summary:
I am a Strategic, Business-driven, Result oriented and Energetic Executive familiar with full P&L responsibilities and a solid track record in global industrial companies at C-level & Senior Management. 

Over 30 years’ experience in developing and executing complex growth plans with management development. Cross-Functional Team Leading global sales and operations and aftersales organizations in the elevator and automated doors industries, all with proven record of accomplishment. As BPO for service organizing the complete service supply chain. Putting engineers safety first, drastically reducing global hazards. Developed and Introduced monthly safety audits.
I am a strong business leader with analytical skills, a good negotiator with great communication skills and a no non-sense mentality. I will get things done with a high level of ownership and engagement with the ability to create a common vision amongst different cultures. Seeking for non-conventional and alternative solutions from a business perspective, balancing the limited resources. My flexible, creative and diplomatic personality creates a good atmosphere.

•Goal-driven leader who can maintain a productive climate and confidently motivates, mobilizes, and coaches employees to meet high performance standards. 
•Intercultural agility - able to influence at all levels of the organization, across functions and external stakeholders.
•Hands on and inclusive leadership style, curiosity and drive to explore new methods and approaches; can-do and positive attitude
•Advanced stakeholder management skills – demonstrated ability to build trust and link different teams in order to deliver improvements in overall performance.
•Ability to achieve change and exceptional results.
•Excellent communication skills.
•Bringing team-focus on business development in order to capture opportunities and obtain sustainable mid-term and long-term profitable growth. 
•Acquisition integration; bringing new acquisitions into an international complex Reporting and Analyse structure.
